title: preparation
description: preparation metadata for an IC Electrophysiology session during a Patch-seq experiment

bathTemperature.description: Temperature, in Celsius, of the ACSF solution the slice is held in during the experiment.

electrodeZeroedEnabled.description: Was the effect of electrode bias current zeroed-out? Yes/No.

restingMembranePotential.description: Upon break-in and formation of a stable seal (typically within the first minute and not more than 3 minutes after break-in), the resting membrane potential of the neuron is recorded.

sealResistance_PassFail.description: A gigohm seal must have been reached prior to break-in.

initialAccessResistance.description: The initial access resistance must be < 20 MÎ© and < 15% of the Rinput (mouse) or 20% of the Rinput (human).

inputResistance.description: After gigaseal formation, the input resistance of the cell is the ratio of target transient capacitance to responding current.
